fullWording: In the last month how often have you been upset because of something that happened unexpectedly
In the last month how often have you felt that you were unable to control the important things in your life
In the last month how often have you felt nervous and "stressed"
In the last month how often have you felt confident about your ability to handle your personal problems

shortWording: Feeling Things Were Going Your Way
fullWording: In the last month how often have you felt that things were going your way

shortWording: Unable to Cope with Things to Do
fullWording: In the last month how often have you found that you could not cope with all the things that you had to do
In the last month how often have you been able to control irritations in your life
In the last month how often have you felt that you were on top of things

shortWording: Angered by Things You Can't Control
fullWording: In the last month how often have you been angered because of things that were outside of your control
In the last month how often have you felt difficulties were piling up so high that you could not overcome them
